src_original: tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 諸菩薩摩訶薩觀一切法都無自性皆如虛空，譬如虛空不作是念：

src_original: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. evam evāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 『我當信解速證無上正等菩提。 』諸菩薩摩訶薩亦應如是不作是念：

src_original: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 『我當信解速證無上正等菩提。 』何以故？

src_original: ākāśasamā hi subhūte (PSP_4:131)  sarvadharmāḥ,
tgt_original: 善現！ 諸法皆空與虛空等，諸菩薩摩訶薩要信解一切法與虛空等及能證知，乃得無上正等菩提。 善現！

src_original: atha ca punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva ākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,  sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucya svabhisaṃbodhā  syād anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir na durabhisaṃbhavā na tv evaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩信解一切法皆與虛空等，便於無上正等菩提易生信解、易證得者，則不應有殑伽沙等菩薩摩訶薩，擐大功德鎧發趣無上正等菩提，於其中間而有退屈。

tgt_original: 」佛言：

src_original: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena sattvānām antike samacittatāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
tgt_original: 「善現！ 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，當於一切有情住平等心，不應住不平等心；
